definition: (of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa

sentences.english: But it is sensible to notice that too much spicy food may cause acute gastritis.
sentences.chinese: 但也應該注意喫太多辛辣食物會導致急性胃炎。

sentences.english: Just like super foods you should not over indulge on spicy foods.
sentences.chinese: 如超級食物一樣，辛辣食物也不能過量食用。

sentences.english: Kava is also the name of the pungent beverage prepared from the plant's roots.
sentences.chinese: 卡瓦根也是由植物根配製的辛辣飲料的名字。

sentences.english: Besides serious topics about marriage, also there are a lot of funny and piquant things in it.
sentences.chinese: 有關男人和女人的話題既有趣，又辛辣。

sentences.english: Beer is a good choice if the salty moon cakes also tasted spicy.
sentences.chinese: 如果鹹月餅味帶辛辣，配啤酒也不錯。

sentences.english: As she sat in church her face had a pathos and poignancy.
sentences.chinese: 當她坐在教堂裏時，臉上帶着一種哀婉和辛辣的表情。

sentences.english: Food in Egypt is hot and spicy, drenched in sauces.
sentences.chinese: 埃及食物多辛辣，並要用醬汁浸透。

sentences.english: Mr. Post asked, referring to the spicy grilled meat sandwich popular throughout the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 他指的是一種在中東地區廣受歡迎的辛辣烤肉三文治。

sentences.english: His tongue was stung by hot food.
sentences.chinese: 他的舌頭被辛辣食品辣得火燒火燎的。

sentences.english: The most distinguishing feature of the Korean food is the spiciness.
sentences.chinese: 韓國食物最顯著的特點就是味道辛辣。

sentences.english: It has a pungent , odour and flavour.
sentences.chinese: 喬說，黑松露氣味和味道辛辣。

sentences.english: Black plums and spice on the nose, deep and rich.
sentences.chinese: 李子和辛辣味在鼻子底下表現明顯，濃郁且豐富。

sentences.english: The novel is characterized by sharp satire and critic realism.
sentences.chinese: 小說以辛辣的諷刺和批判的現實主義見長。

sentences.english: The acrid smell of burning wood reminds me of my childhood.
sentences.chinese: 燃燒木材的辛辣味道使我想起了我的童年。

sentences.english: Dry martini , Beefeater. All right, sir.
sentences.chinese: 辛辣馬丁尼，比飛特，好的，先生。

sentences.english: His spice blend is a peppery one.
sentences.chinese: 他那辛辣的文筆是麻辣味的。
